lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Hello, how can I help you?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Hello mister I would like to have your attention…I think what I offer will intrigue you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: And what is that?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Information…my business runs on it and I think yours will thrive from it!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I don't think I can give you any interesting information. Just a super normal guy working at a very normal kiosk, but if you can tell me what you actually offer, maybe my boss would like to collaborate with whatever you are doing, he was mentioning some stuff recently…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
I am not so sure, unfortunately my associates are not looking for such collaboration. The business works closely with the big companies they have suffered greatly since the NEU regulations on private information.
Even I lost my job after the crash…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: So look, any customer data you can give me will be extremely valuable. This way everyone wins, what do you say

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Uh…no thanks buddy, I will have to pass. I don't know about my boss, and I am not going to ask him actually, but I don't like to have dealings with people like you.
The more I hear the more I get the creeps…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Look, I lost my job when NEU regulations hit. Companies only care about data now. You either sell or you starve

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Who am I? A person doing his best to make a living, nothing more! I can also sell you parts for a discount, I don't make this offer often….

responses.responseText: No need to hear more Shady

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Goodbye Shady

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: That is not a way to speak to a customer, Cashier. You are proving nothing….just losing a very valuable offer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No not interested, please go away or I call the police

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Here is something from me...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Piss off…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: It doesnt end here,cashier...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Damn scary...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
You are one of those… steals data, then sells it, and acts like they are providing you a service

I think you are wasting your time here and mine

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Mind your tongue, Cashier, that is not a way to speak to a customer. You are proving nothing!
Just losing a very valuable offer...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
...
You are not a customer, all of our customers are locals you dont sound local

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
You are right, I don't care about the goods you have nor am I from here but how does that even matter?
What if I can offer you valuable information, then my services will be of very good use to your business?
Or vice versa

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I don't care about it. I just work here, and I only work with people who want the goods we sell, and it seems that you are not one of them

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Look, cashier, we are simply providing a service for Brootle…A service that people don't understand is going to help them in the long run

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Of what service can they really be? And how is that a help when you are going behind their back to learn better how the big companies can exploit them even more? Actually no wait, not a need to hear anything more from you.

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Well, cashier I have been trying to reason with you like a human but you dont listen to reason. How about this then…
My sources….they will take your store data, including yours and then sell it. It is inevitable.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Why don't you do it then,Shady?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
It will be easier if you give it now, the encription is strong
For the resaurces you are saving my team I can garantee your data safity and monitary gain. What better offer can you get?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, what am I doing, I am falling for cheap manipulation, not today Shady...

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: You are smarter than you look. Here is my card. I will come back.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thanks... I guess. Well...that was scary.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Scary...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: How much money are we talking?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
1000 NEU on the initial data transfer of every customer information you have gathered. For later transactions we will negotiate.
The less information, the less you have to offer, resulting in less money

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, that's a lot of money, man. You sure you have that much?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Yes, I have them in me ready to be given to you, just need to make the transaction. There you see it now?
You can see why I do it, companies are obsessed with data
They give so much money just for a small piece of information...
If I had a choice, I wouldn't do it, but it is the best a person like me and you can do in this economy...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yea… for companies, they want data that is understandable but still in a legal secure way not through some shady third party and most importantly without the consent of the user. Talking about that…Morals man

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
I warned you about your way of speaking. With this way of speaking you are never going to find a better job. But the truth is the user has never had full consent….
I know it is not the best thing to do...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Don't try to make it light. You seem to know you are doing something bad, why insist so hard on it then?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: See, I look at it this way… companies win in the end either way, we are powerless to do anything. I want to win as well some way, then you win also, and the customer is minimally affected. If even they win in the end with a better product.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Best scenario in this age...Bullshit...You are lying to yourself to feel less worthless.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: But ok man, you win, fine. I will fold. But I need to see the money first...

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Here. Now transfer me the data quickly…We spend too much time already...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There you go, shady dude. You happy now?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Of course I am. We will do more business in the future

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Of course I am. We will do more business in the future

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You know there are cameras everywhere and surveillance 24/7? The NEU is very serious about this stuff. It seems like you don't follow the news, man...People like you get bad punishment from the government forces

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Well, cashier, without such a risk, there won't be a worthy reward.Besides, do you think I will be this stupid to go to a place with a high risk to be caught.
Surveillance is not everywhere; in remote places like these, there is still peace from all the control of the government
It is heaven for what we do...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa careful it is what you do but not what I do that is for sure.Especially in places like this, new tech is still approaching so unfortunetely I have to agree with you.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: But still?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Not a problem for me, I can deal with risk when the reward is wroth it.I can teach you how to do it, but it is up to you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: For me, it is still a problem but I will say yes.

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Is that your final answer?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, what are the prices for information?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Since you are my first time customer it will be 500 NEUR but usually it is around 1000 NEUR.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ah man that is a lot of money still, doesnt matter it will help the business hopefully this way the boss will increase my salary

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: I send information to improve your business, you dont need to worry about promotion anymore.

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: You got my point now, cashier? In this economy to be honest means being hungry.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah dude, besides that I can barely pay my rent let alone the food….It is not easy.There you go give me what you have and lets be done...

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Here, check if data is what you need, I am fair in my exchanges…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Appreciate it, yeah seems all good now, thanks dude you saved my skin, business is not doing so well...

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: We will do more business in the future, Mr Clerk

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sure...
